item.title: OpenAI is the world’s most valuable private company after private stock sale
item.description: OpenAI employees sold $6.6B in shares, leading company's valuation to jump to $500B.

item.title: Apple shelves Vision Pro overhaul to focus on AI glasses
item.description: Bloomberg reports that the tech giant is developing at least two types of smart glasses.

item.title: Last chance alert: Founder and Investor Bundle savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 ends tomorrow
item.description: Founder and Investor Bundle savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 end tomorrow, October 3. Groups of 4–9 founders save 15% and investors save 20%. Acces...

item.title: Spacecoin beams blockchain transaction through space in bid for decentralized internet
item.description: Spacecoin envisions a decentralized rival to SpaceX's Starlink.

item.title: Perplexity acquires the team behind Sequioa-backed AI design startup Visual Electric
item.description: Perplexity has acquired Visual Electric, an AI Design tool. Its team is going to lead a new agents experience group at Perplexity
